title: The Folio Book of Christmas Crime Stories
description: Includes stories by Agatha Christie, Colin Dexter, Liza Cody, E.W. Hornung, Edward D. Hoch, Ellis Peters, Stanley Ellin, Tim Heald, Ngaio Marsh, Peter Lovesey, Sara Paretsky, Margery Allingham, P.D. James, Arthur Conan Doyle & Margaret Yorke.
author: Michael Foreman
